Charlie Crist: s past positions as a Republican lawmaker are being brought up as he seeks to return to elected office as a Democrat.
Crist is challenging incumbent Rep: David Jolly for Florida's 13th Congressional District.
During a televised debate: Jolly brought up Crist's proposal to restore chain gangs to Florida while Crist served as a Republican in the state Senate in the 1990s.
Crist: s claim about Florida being No. 1 in violent crime in America in the mid 1990s and a violent crime occurring every three minutes and 45 seconds is supported by data from the Disaster Center and the Florida Department of Law Enforcement.
